_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The four meditators [sn34.7:1.4]: One meditator who is skilled in immersion but not in projecting the mind purified by immersion
Another meditator who is skilled in projecting the mind purified by immersion but not in immersion
Another meditator who is skilled in neither immersion nor projecting the mind purified by immersion
Another meditator who is skilled in both immersion and projecting the mind purified by immersion
